scenario_text.value: Hope you didn’t forget about me, Takuma!
Saki! Floramon! You’re all right, too!

Are you guys good? Don’t push yourselves too
hard, we’ve got your backs!

We took a break to gather our nerves, but
we’re all fired up now, baby!

A break, she says. We didn’t even know
a fight was going on...
Hey, shhh! That’s our little secret!

Uh, anyway, we gotta teach you some manners.
Let’s go, Syakomon!
It’s all you! Please, you two, stop Renamon!

(What? More enemies?! We’re gonna have to
regroup...)
